QuestData.Title: Track Beasts
QuestData.Description: The art of tracking is the soul of the hunt, and you did well in finding me here. I am no seasoned expert, but I've been taught well; I can share with you more ways of following beasts and finding your prey.$B$BIt is the least I can do in repayment for saving me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Honu Staghunter and learn Track Beasts.
